caption.p: Box-Whisker-Plots of projected changes in Basin Irrigation Potential (BIP) for the 2 °C global warming scenario (upper panels) and the 1.5 °C global warming scenario (lower panels). Changes for 2 °C and 1.5 °C are expressed as a percent of reference period values. Differences between the changes of the two scenarios are expressed as percent of the 1.5 °C ones.
